title: LoLClient.exe - BadImage
body:
{{sticker:sg-shisa}} I just want to play league. I randomly got this message one day, then I uninstalled the game, reinstalled it, reinstalled it as an administrator,  made sure my windows was updated,and uninstalled it again. Nothing has worked, it keeps popping up the exact same message, over and over again.

Anyone got something that might fix it?{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
Most of the time those bad image errors mean that some game files are missing or heavily corrupted. Go through the steps in the image I'll link below, and let me know if that helps.

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
Thanks Bro! It worked like a charm!{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
